name: justbingo
description: Just Bingo - A customizable bingo game with dual backend support

scripts.setup:backend: echo "Backend setup complete. Update .env file with admin credentials."
scripts.setup: echo "Choose setup: npm run setup:pocketbase OR npm run setup:backend"
scripts.config:pocketbase: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const config={usingPocketBase:true,pocketBaseUrl:'http://127.0.0.1:8090',usingBackend:false,backendUrl:'http://localhost:3000'}; fs.writeFileSync('public/appsettings.json', JSON.stringify(config,null,2)); console.log('✅ Switched to PocketBase backend');"
scripts.config:backend: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const config={usingPocketBase:false,pocketBaseUrl:'http://127.0.0.1:8090',usingBackend:true,backendUrl:'http://localhost:3000'}; fs.writeFileSync('public/appsettings.json', JSON.stringify(config,null,2)); console.log('✅ Switched to Node.js backend');"
